channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.6)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.6)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # このプロジェクトの重要な変更点は以下のとおりです。 Keep a Changelogをベースにした形式で表記されています。 1.6.6 - 2024-01-31 # Fixed # Some features are not working well if Trace and Optimize is not attached #876 1.6.5 - 2024-01-29 # Changed # AvatarOptimizer now uses ErrorReporting API of NDMF instead of our own API #805 Project is slightly renamed to AAO: Avatar Optimizer #830 The term AAO and Avatar Optimizer are not changed, but display name on the VCC is changed to AAO: Avatar Optimizer Fixed # Fix support for UniVRM components #802 VRM: Fix MergeSkinnedMesh breaking BlendShapeClip / VRM10Expression #810 Unknown component warning were shown multiple time for one type #818 In addition, location of the unknown components are shown on the error report.
